inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getSessionContext.

arn.description:
ARN for an assumed role.

> If `arn` is a non-role ARN, Pulumi gives no error and `issuer_arn` will be equal to the `arn` value. For STS assumed-role ARNs, Pulumi gives an error if the identified IAM role does not exist.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getSessionContext.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

issuerArn.description: IAM source role ARN if `arn` corresponds to an STS assumed role. Otherwise, `issuer_arn` is equal to `arn`.

issuerId.description: Unique identifier of the IAM role that issues the STS assumed role.

issuerName.description: Name of the source role. Only available if `arn` corresponds to an STS assumed role.

sessionName.description: Name of the STS session. Only available if `arn` corresponds to an STS assumed role.
